## UpdateParams interface

frame info pass to `Component.update` method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface UpdateParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [deltaTime](api/eva.js.updateparams.deltatime.md) | number | delta time from last frame |
|  [fps](api/eva.js.updateparams.fps.md) | number | fps at current frame |
|  [frameCount](api/eva.js.updateparams.framecount.md) | number | frame count since game begining |
